0: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi fired back at former House Speaker Newt Gingrich on Sunday, after Gingrich described an 2008 climate change ad he made with Pelosi as "the dumbest single thing I’ve done." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "Well, I don't want to make any comments about Newt Gingrich, he who has been fined $300,000 by the ethics committee — you think he'd consider that a big mistake," Pelosi said on CNN's "State of the Union." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "Since you brought up my name in association with him as the dumbest thing he ever did, I think there is plenty of stiff competition for that honor as far as his activities are concerned," the California Democrat said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Gingrich has apologized to Republican voters for the 2008 ad that was partially organized by former Vice President Al Gore. But Pelosi said she had no regrets about making the ad with Gingrich. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "I'm not turning my back on the need for us to address the climate crisis in the world. I hope he isn't either," she said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Read more about: Nancy Pelosi, Newt Gingrich — need my change — of partially Nancy need dumbest that think ethics "I'm
